Huskies ambushed in the desert WOMENS BASKETBALL Frustration leads to Gobrechts first ejection at Washington Brian Lewis Daily Staff

The Sun Devils outplayed the Huskies in their  win last night in Tempe Ariz.With both the NCAA Tournament and its position in the Pac10 on the line the Huskies played tight while the secondtolast place Sun Devils played with nothing to lose PERIOD said UW Coach Chris Gobrecht PERIOD The performance left Gobrecht uptight as well PERIOD With  remaining she was ejected after drawing a doubletechnical for disputing a possession call PERIOD It was the first time she has been ejected in her 11year tenure at Washington.Oregon downed USC  last night and after Arizonas  loss to WSU the Ducks stand alone in third PERIOD With its fifth conference loss in seven games Washington  Pac10  overall is tied for fourth place with the Wildcats.Arizona State   completed its unexpected season sweep of Washington with a careerhigh  points from unknown juniorcollege transfer LaToya Johnson PERIOD The Sun Devils unpredictable game plan also disrupted Washingtons defense throughout the contest PERIOD Gobrecht said PERIOD Its a style of play that just doesnt fit with our defense which is geared toward stopping the Stanfords of the world.The way in which the game was being called just kept building an incredible level of frustrationThen the final straw was the kid threw the ball out of bounds and Amber never touched it and the officials gave it to them PERIOD It was pretty clear that she never touched it but evidently they saw it otherwise and that was it PERIOD
